name: ManyGhosts
description:
Gameplay inspired by PvZ and Vampire Survivors

Don't let the ghosts reach the end and escape, improve your weapons, level them up and give them upgrades to kill ghosts faster, and survive as long as you can.

Buy new and various weapons.

Buy skills for weapons.

Add skills to weapons to give them new effects to kill faster, and don't forget to level up any weapons you buy.

It can be difficult at first, but the more you play the more weapons and skills you will have.

If you like the project leave us a donation
